SEARCH
Package io.github.blyznytsiaorg.bibernate.dao.jdbc.identity

Class AbstractGenerator

java.lang.Object
io.github.blyznytsiaorg.bibernate.dao.jdbc.identity.AbstractGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
IdentityIdGenerator, NoneIdGenerator, SequenceIdGenerator
public abstract class AbstractGenerator extends Object
An abstract base class for identity generators in Bibernate, providing common functionality which can be used for generating insert queries to database.

This class is designed to be extended by specific generators that handle the id generation and generations of insert queries

      Parameters:

      statement - The prepared statement to be populated.
      generatedId - The generated ID for the entity.

    • getGeneratedValue

      protected static Optional<Object> getGeneratedValue(Field field, Field generatedValueField, Object generatedId)
      Retrieves the generated value for a field, handling the case where it matches the generated ID.
      Parameters:
      field - The field for which the generated value is retrieved.
      generatedValueField - The field representing the generated value.
      generatedId - The generated ID.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the generated value or empty if it is not the generated ID.

    • addUpdatedEntity

      protected void addUpdatedEntity(Object entity)
      Adds an updated entity to the current transaction to be able to clean up ids in case of rollback transaction.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to be added to the transaction.

    • insertManyToManyJoinTable

      protected <T> void insertManyToManyJoinTable(Collection<T> entities, DataSource dataSource)
      Generates and executes insert query for join table in case of many-to-many relation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of entities in the collection.
      Parameters:
      entities - The collection of entities participating in the many-to-many relationship.
      dataSource - The data source for obtaining a database connection.
      Throws:
      BibernateGeneralException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL statements.
